content: Define the module named TopModule with a 32-bit input port 'in' and a 32-bit output port 'out'.
source: I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified. - input  in  (32 bits) - output out (32 bits)

content: Plan the implementation of a wire or register to hold the reversed byte order of the input 'in'.
source: The module should reverse the byte order of a 32-bit vector.

content: Implement the logic to reverse the byte order of the 32-bit input 'in' and assign it to the output 'out'.
source: The module should reverse the byte order of a 32-bit vector.
